title: Clown of Slipknot Gets Busy Blending Bourbon
itunes:title: Clown of Slipknot Gets Busy Blending Bourbon
description: In a rare opportunity, Fred Minnick sat down with heavy metal icon Shawn Crahan, aka Clown of Slipknot, They blended Iowa Bourbon at Cedar Ridge and Clown opened up about his favorite foods and more.
content:encoded: In a rare opportunity, Fred Minnick sat down with heavy metal icon Shawn Crahan, aka Clown of Slipknot, They blended Iowa Bourbon at Cedar Ridge and Clown opened up about his favorite foods and more.
author: info@podcastone.com
itunes:author: Fred Minnick
